text: Female Trouble is an American LGBT comedy movie. It is about 1960s Baltimore mixed with sexual adventures and criminal activity. This movie was released on October 4, 1974 in the United States by New Line Cinema. The rating is NC-17. This movie got very positive reviews. John Waters directed this movie. title: Female Trouble
